title: No mystery skin w/ purchase of "definitely not vel koz"
body: I don't know how long it typically takes to get the free mystery skin, but it hasn't showed up yet. I'd like either a free mystery skin like I was supposed to get, or a refund. I only bought it because I thought I was getting a free skin as well. Thanks for reading.

replies.body: Definitely Not Vel'Koz isn't a legendary skin.  That free mystery skin is only for Legendary skins I believe.  Either way, in the store, if they are going to give you a mystery skin there is this little +chest icon in the lower right of the skin icon
well looks like i Screwed up, fml.

No biggie!  Hopefully you still wanted the skin.  Also, Primetime Draven and Surprise Party Fiddlesticks are both 975 RP Legendary skins that will give you the free mystery skin... if that helps at all.
That's correct - only legendary and ultimate skins. There is an icon that indicates which skins are eligible for the mystery skin. :)

What if I buy a ludicrous tier skin would i get a mystery skin?
